clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the kettle.

press_button.description: Press the button on the kettle.

clean_button.description: Clean the button on the kettle.

clean_kettle_body.description: Clean the body of the kettle.

clean_whole_kettle.description: Clean the entire kettle including the lid, button, and kettle body.

press_button_and_clean_kettle.description: Press the button on the kettle and then clean entire kettle.
